welcome_message_body: "Welcome to West Caldwell, a charming town known for its beautiful natural landscapes and friendly community. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport is exclusively for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport is used for shipping and receiving of goods and materials.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linden Airport serves both commercial and private flights. It offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Linden Airport caters to private and charter flights. It provides a luxurious and exclusive experience for travelers.

wifi.note: Wifi access is free for all travelers.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic flights, with a few international flights to Canada.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal is the largest at LaGuardia and serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves mostly domestic flights, with a few international flights to Canada and the Caribbean.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: This terminal is the smallest at LaGuardia and serves only domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect for free for up to 30 minutes, after which a fee is required.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves Delta Air Lines and its partner airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal serves a mix of domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: This terminal serves JetBlue Airways and its partner airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves British Airways and its partner airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves American Airlines and its partner airlines.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.
